channel.title: SMAC Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SMAC Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Boardroom Inks TV and Film Deal With SMAC Entertainment (Exclusive)
item.description: The two media brands, founded by Kevin Durant and Rich Kleiman, and Michael Strahan and Constance Schwartz-Morini, already have three unscripted film and TV projects in development.
